original: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato mātugāmo ekantaamanāpo hoti purisassa.
analyzed: pañcahi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgataḥ mātugāmaḥ ekanta amanāpaḥ hoti purisassa

original: Na ca rūpavā hoti, na ca bhogavā hoti, na ca sīlavā hoti, alaso ca hoti, pajañcassa na labhati—
analyzed: na ca rūpavā hoti na ca bhogavā hoti na ca sīlavā hoti alasaḥ ca hoti pajañcassa na labhati

original: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato mātugāmo ekantaamanāpo hoti purisassa.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgataḥ mātugāmaḥ ekanta amanāpaḥ hoti purisassa

original: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato mātugāmo ekantamanāpo hoti purisassa.
analyzed: pañcahi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgataḥ mātugāmaḥ ekanta manāpaḥ hoti purisassa

original: Rūpavā ca hoti, bhogavā ca hoti, sīlavā ca hoti, dakkho ca hoti analaso, pajañcassa labhati—
analyzed: rūpavā ca hoti bhogavā ca hoti sīlavā ca hoti dakkho ca hoti analaso pajañcassa labhati

original: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato mātugāmo ekantamanāpo hoti purisassā”ti.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgataḥ mātugāmaḥ ekanta manāpaḥ hoti purisassa ati

original: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato puriso ekantaamanāpo hoti mātugāmassa.
analyzed: pañcahi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgataḥ puriso ekanta amanāpaḥ hoti mātugāmassa

original: Na ca rūpavā hoti, na ca bhogavā hoti, na ca sīlavā hoti, alaso ca hoti, pajañcassa na labhati—
analyzed: na ca rūpavā hoti na ca bhogavā hoti na ca sīlavā hoti alasaḥ ca hoti pajañcassa na labhati

original: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato puriso ekantaamanāpo hoti mātugāmassa.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgataḥ purisaḥ ekanta amanāpaḥ hoti mātugāmassa

original: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato puriso ekantamanāpo hoti mātugāmassa.
analyzed: pañcahi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgataḥ puriso ekanta manāpaḥ hoti mātugāmassa

original: Rūpavā ca hoti, bhogavā ca hoti, sīlavā ca hoti, dakkho ca hoti analaso, pajañcassa labhati—
analyzed: rūpavā ca hoti bhogavā ca hoti sīlavā ca hoti dakkho ca hoti analaso pajañcassa labhati

original: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato puriso ekantamanāpo hoti mātugāmassā”ti.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgataḥ puriso ekanta manāpaḥ hoti mātu gāmassa ati

original: “Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, mātugāmassa āveṇikāni dukkhāni, yāni mātugāmo paccanubhoti, aññatreva purisehi.
analyzed: pañcimāni bhikkhave mātugāmassa āveṇikāni dukkhāni yāni mātugāmaḥ paccanubhoti aññatra iva purisehi

original: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo daharova samāno patikulaṁ gacchati, ñātakehi vinā hoti.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave mātugāmaḥ daharaḥ uva samānaḥ pati kulam gacchati ñātakehi vinā hoti

original: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, mātugāmassa paṭhamaṁ āveṇikaṁ dukkhaṁ, yaṁ mātugāmo paccanubhoti, aññatreva purisehi.
analyzed: idam bhikkhave mātugāmassa paṭhamam āveṇikam dukkha yam mātugāmaḥ paccanubhoti aññatra iva purisehi

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, mātugāmo utunī hoti.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave mātugāmaḥ utunī hoti

original: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, mātugāmassa dutiyaṁ āveṇikaṁ dukkhaṁ, yaṁ mātugāmo paccanubhoti, aññatreva purisehi.
analyzed: idam bhikkhave mātugāmassa dutiyam āveṇikam dukkha yam mātugāmaḥ paccanubhoti aññatra iva purisehi

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, mātugāmo gabbhinī hoti.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave mātugāmaḥ gabbhinī hoti

original: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, mātugāmassa tatiyaṁ āveṇikaṁ dukkhaṁ, yaṁ mātugāmo paccanubhoti, aññatreva purisehi.
analyzed: idam bhikkhave mātugāmassa tatiyam āveṇikam dukkha yam mātugāmaḥ paccanubhoti aññatra iva purisehi

original: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, mātugāmassa catutthaṁ āveṇikaṁ dukkhaṁ, yaṁ mātugāmo paccanubhoti, aññatreva purisehi.
analyzed: idam bhikkhave mātugāmassa catuttham āveṇikam dukkha yam mātugāmaḥ paccanubhoti aññatra iva purisehi

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, mātugāmo purisassa pāricariyaṁ upeti.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave mātugāmaḥ purisassa pāricariyam upeti

original: Idaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmassa pañcamaṁ āveṇikaṁ dukkhaṁ, yaṁ mātugāmo paccanubhoti, aññatreva purisehi.
analyzed: idam kho bhikkhave mātugāmassa pañcamam āveṇikam dukkha yam mātugāmaḥ paccanubhoti aññatra iva purisehi

original: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca mātugāmassa āveṇikāni dukkhāni, yāni mātugāmo paccanubhoti, aññatreva purisehī”ti.
analyzed: imāni kho bhikkhave pañca mātugāmassa āveṇikāni dukkhāni yāni mātugāmaḥ paccanubhoti aññatra iva purisehi iti

original: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo yebhuyyena kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgataḥ mātugāmaḥ yebhuyyena kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjati

original: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo pubbaṇhasamayaṁ maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā agāraṁ ajjhāvasati.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave mātugāmaḥ pubbaṇhasamayam macchera mala pariyuṭṭhitena cetasā agāram ajjhāvasati
majjhanhika samayam issā pariyuṭṭhitena cetasā agāram ajjhāvasati
sāyanha samayam kāma rāga pariyuṭṭhitena cetasā agāram ajjhāvasati

original: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo yebhuyyena kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjatī”ti.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave tīhi dhammehi samannāgataḥ mātugāmaḥ yebhuyyena kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjati iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā anuruddho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmai anuruddhaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmai anuruddhaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “idhāhaṁ, bhante, mātugāmaṁ passāmi dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjantaṁ.

original: Katīhi nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjatī”ti?
analyzed: katīhi nu kho bhante dhammehi samannāgataḥ mātugāmaḥ kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjati iti

original: “Pañcahi kho, anuruddha, dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: pañcahi kho anuruddha dhammehi samannāgataḥ mātugāmaḥ kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjati
